text: Grete Stückgold (6 July 1895, in London – 15 September 1977, in Falls Village, Connecticut) was a British-American operatic soprano. She married . Her debut at the Metropolitan Opera was on November 2, 1927 the role of Eva in Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg. at Metropolitan Opera Archives In 1929 she created the lead in Paul Hindemith's opera Neues vom Tage. ==References== ==External links== *List of performances at the Metropolitan Opera Category:1895 births Category:1977 deaths Category:American operatic sopranos Category:Singers from London Category:English operatic sopranos Category:People from Canaan, Connecticut Category:20th-century American opera singers Category:20th-century women opera singers Category:20th-century English singers Category:20th- century American women singers
title: Grete Stückgold
